content: 1. What type of production system is highlighted in the description?

answers.text: a) autonomous systems
b) Artificial intelligence
c) distributed systems
d) Complex systems

content: 2. Which of the following statements best describes the main function of the "magical triangles" concept?

answers.text: a) the optimization of production processes.
b) The reduction of costs and the increase in product quality.
c) the integration of different production methods.
d) the improvement in customer satisfaction.

content: 3. Which of the following is a property of the "networked" world?

answers.text: a) The reduction of resource consumption.
b) the promotion of innovations.
c) the improvement of communication and cooperation.
d) the minimization of environmental risks.

content: 4. What is the main purpose of the "digital transformation" in the context of product development?

answers.text: a) the reduction in production costs.
b) the improvement of customer experience.
c) The integration of digital technologies into all production processes.
d) the optimization of the supply chain.

content: 5. Which of the following statements best describes the role of the "changed working conditions"?

answers.text: a) the reduction of the workload.
b) the promotion of innovations.
c) adaptation to new technologies and processes.
d) the improvement of employee satisfaction.

content: 6. Which of the following information is highlighted in the text?

answers.text: a) the meaning of sustainability.
b) the advantages of automation.
c) the role of customer feedback.
d) the advantages of global networking.

content: 7. Which of the following is a result of the "changed working conditions"?

answers.text: a) the reduction of the workload.
b) the promotion of innovations.
c) adaptation to new technologies.
d) the improvement of employee satisfaction.

content: 8. Which of the following is an example of a "scenic learning question"?

answers.text: a) "Which production methods are most efficient?"
b) "How can we improve our customer satisfaction?"
c) "How can we optimize our supply chain?"
d) "Which new materials are suitable for production?"

content: 9. Which of the following statements best describes the goal of the "digital economy"?

answers.text: a) reducing labor costs.
b) the promotion of innovations.
c) the improvement of efficiency and productivity.
d) the minimization of the environmental impact.

content: 10. Which aspect of the "digital transformation" is particularly emphasized in the text?

answers.text: a) Reducing raw material consumption.
b) the integration of different production methods.
c) the improvement in customer loyalty.
d) the optimization of logistics.

content: 11. Which of the following statements is best suited to describe the text?

answers.text: a) The text is an academic work.
b) The text is a guide for the implementation of production processes.
c) The text describes the development of a new production philosophy.
d) The text is a report on the effects of sustainability on the economy.

content: 12. What advantage is highlighted in the text?

answers.text: a) the reduction in production costs.
b) the promotion of innovations.
c) the improvement in customer experience.
d) the optimization of the supply chain.

content: 13. Which of the following statements best reflects the meaning of the "networked" world?

answers.text: a) the reduction in transport costs.

c) the improvement of communication and cooperation.

content: 14. What is the central focus of the text?

answers.text: a) The history of product development.

c) The effects of digitization on production.

content: 15. Which of the following statements is best describes the role of the "product variants" in production planning?

answers.text: a) You are just one way to improve product quality.
b) They enable adaptation to different customer needs.
c) They are only suitable for small companies.
d) They can only be used in production.
